title: 3/17/17 - Full Show
description:
Why was Stu listening to Barry White? ...Al Gore is back ...'A nature hike through the book of Revelation...North Korea prepping for an EMP strike against the US? ...Pay attention to North Korea ...America to get involved in another war?...How Warren Harding and Calvin Coolidge saved America from a deep depression ...Ronald Reagan emulated Calvin Coolidge ...Supreme Court hearings for Neil Gorsuch begin next week.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio

Facebook: Glenn BeckTwitter: @glennbeck
